Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Glucophone™M Meter combined with Cell Phone (Motorola v3)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Glucophone™ Blood Glucose Monitoring System utilizing glucose oxidase and electrochemical detection integrated with a cell phone.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood from various sites for diabetic patients or healthcare professionals in home and clinical settings; for in vitro use only; compatible with cell phone; not for neonatal use or diabetes diagnosis/screening; alternate site testing during steady state.
